onBoardingItems.ob1Body: You can have medical record address by verifying your ID number or NIK through our apps
onBoardingItems.ob2Title: Why do I need a blockchain medical record?
onBoardingItems.ob2Body: Blockchain medical records are like ultra-secure, patient-controlled filing cabinets for your medical history.
onBoardingItems.ob3Title: What can I do with my blockchain medical record?
onBoardingItems.ob3Body: Securely share your medical history with authorized providers for better care coordination & Enjoy greater control and security over your medical data.
